data.lyric:
[ti:Every Little Thing]
[ar:Russell Dickerson]
[al:Yours]
[by:]

[00:00.00]Every Little Thing - Russell Dickerson
[00:05.69]Written by：Casey Brown/Russell Dickerson/Parker Welling
[00:11.38]My baby she's Alabama
[00:13.99]A Dixie land delight kissin' me like molasses
[00:18.91]Slow and sweet mhm just right
[00:21.70]She's an endless August summer yeah sunshine 365
[00:26.64]When she forgets the punch line
[00:28.99]It still gets me every time
[00:31.53]'Cause I love every little every little
[00:35.37]Every little thing about her love
[00:38.53]Just a little just a little just a little ain't enough
[00:43.66]Gotta get a gotta get a
[00:45.62]Get a little more of all she does
[00:48.98]I'm all hung up 'cause I love
[00:53.91]Every little every little
[00:55.79]Every little thing about her love
[00:58.47]
[01:07.02]Yeah she's Seattle and Sonoma
[01:09.82]Runs on coffee and red wine
[01:12.66]She's easy like Sunday morning and wild like Saturday night
[01:17.70]She's 24 carat goodness an angel's all I see
[01:22.90]She dresses up for everything
[01:24.82]
[01:25.48]But she only dress down for me
[01:27.74]And I love every little every little
[01:31.56]Every little thing about her love
[01:34.64]Just a little just a little just a little ain't enough
[01:39.89]Gotta get a gotta get a
[01:41.79]Get a little more of all she does
[01:44.62]
[01:45.13]I'm all hung up 'cause I love
[01:50.08]Every little every little
[01:52.02]Every little thing about her love
[01:54.68]
[02:01.09]Com'on
[02:01.51]
[02:09.00]My baby she's Alabama
[02:11.41]My Dixie land delight
[02:13.94]She's everybody's dream girl but she's all mine
[02:20.14]And I love every little every little
[02:23.88]Every little thing about her love
[02:26.99]Just a little just a little
[02:29.00]Just a little ain't enough
[02:31.63]
[02:32.18]Gotta get a gotta get a

[02:36.84]

[02:47.00]

data.trans:
[ti:Every Little Thing]
[ar:Russell Dickerson]
[al:Yours]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:05.69]//
[00:11.38]我的宝贝 她来自阿拉巴马
[00:13.99]为我带来新的喜悦 她的吻像蜜糖一样可口
[00:18.91]轻柔又甜美 恰到好处
[00:21.70]她像夏日一样 热情似火 每天都活力十足
[00:26.64]虽然她口拙
[00:28.99]但总能触动到我
[00:31.53]就连她喜欢的一点一滴
[00:35.37]我都喜欢不已
[00:38.53]哪怕再多一点点 一点点也不能满足我
[00:43.66]我要知道
[00:45.62]知道更多关于她的一切
[00:48.98]我心绪不宁 一直在想她 因为
[00:53.91]就连她喜欢的一点一滴
[00:55.79]我都喜欢不已
[00:58.47]
[01:07.02]她既高高在上又平易近人
[01:09.82]她像咖啡一样让人上瘾 又像红酒一样让人沉醉
[01:12.66]她像周日的清晨随和安逸 又像周六的夜晚热情奔放
[01:17.70]她是真正的女神 是我亲眼所见的天使
[01:22.90]在其他人面前 她总是精心打扮
[01:24.82]
[01:25.48]可在我面前 她未施粉黛
[01:27.74]就连她喜欢的一点一滴
[01:31.56]我都喜欢不已
[01:34.64]哪怕再多一点点 一点点也不能满足我
[01:39.89]我要知道
[01:41.79]知道更多关于她的一切
[01:44.62]
[01:45.13]我心绪不宁 一直在想她 因为
[01:50.08]就连她喜欢的一点一滴
[01:52.02]我都喜欢不已
[01:54.68]
[02:01.09]来吧
[02:01.51]
[02:09.00]我的宝贝 她来自阿拉巴马
[02:11.41]为我带来新的喜悦
[02:13.94]她是大众情人 可她现在只属于我
[02:20.14]就连她喜欢的一点一滴
[02:23.88]我都喜欢
[02:26.99]哪怕再多一点点
[02:29.00]一点点也不能满足我
[02:31.63]
[02:32.18]我要知道
[02:34.16]知道更多关于她的一切
[02:36.84]
[02:37.47]我心绪不宁 一直在想她 因为
[02:42.34]就连她喜欢的一点一滴
[02:44.32]我都喜欢
[02:47.00]
[02:50.47]她喜欢的一切
[02:52.39]
[02:54.16]//

[03:05.82]她喜欢的一切
